lessons.japanese: 教育は進歩をもたらす力だ。
lessons.english: Education is the agent of progress.

lessons.japanese: 寒い冬の後、春は穏やかな天候をもたらす。
lessons.english: Spring brings mild weather after the cold winter.

lessons.japanese: 核兵器は人類の絶滅をもたらすかもしれない。
lessons.english: Nuclear weapons may bring about the annihilation of man.

lessons.japanese: 一生懸命することは君に勝利をもたらす。
lessons.english: Hard work and dedication will bring you success.

lessons.japanese: バイオテクノロジーは農業に革命をもたらすだろう。
lessons.english: Biotechnology will bring about a revolution in agriculture.

lessons.japanese: それはあなたの家に災難をもたらすでしょう。
lessons.english: It will bring down trouble on your family.

lessons.japanese: その事業は投資に対してかなりの利回りをもたらすだろう。
lessons.english: The business will yield a fair return on the investment.

lessons.japanese: しかし、私はそれがすべての人に幸福をもたらすか確信がない。
lessons.english: But I'm not sure whether it brings happiness to everybody.

lessons.japanese: この行動は私に不満をもたらす。
この決定は彼の将来に悪影響をもたらすだろう。
lessons.english: This decision will reflect on his future career.

lessons.japanese: かねが幸福をもたらすとは限らない。
lessons.english: Money does not always bring happiness.

lessons.japanese: お金が幸福をもたらすとは限らない。
lessons.english: Money does not always bring happiness.
